experience.title: Technical Editor
experience.description: * Worked on 35+ technical books, reviewing and editing content on various IT frameworks, languages, and tools.* Collaborated with authors to review and edit technical content on IT frameworks and tools.* Partnered with technical reviewers globally to resolve content and code related issues to maintain editorial standards.* Tested and verified code for accuracy and functionality, troubleshooting issues as necessary.* Addressed author queries and provided support on internal editorial processes.* Worked with stakeholders to ensure timely and quality publication delivery.
experience.description_html: * Worked on 35+ technical books, reviewing and editing content on various IT frameworks, languages, and tools.* Collaborated with authors to review and edit technical content on IT frameworks and tools.* Partnered with technical reviewers globally to resolve content and code related issues to maintain editorial standards.* Tested and verified code for accuracy and functionality, troubleshooting issues as necessary.* Addressed author queries and provided support on internal editorial processes.* Worked with stakeholders to ensure timely and quality publication delivery.

education.title: Indore Institute of Science and Technology
